wikitext.*:
'''Colin John Rudd''' is a British musician and singer who has released numerous songs of poems from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works. He has performed at Oxford University for [[The Tolkien Society]] and currently has a collection of 9 songs relating to Tolkien, published in [[2001]] as ''[[Songs of JRR Tolkien]]''. He has published 28 Tolkien related songs on his Youtube channel since October of 2006.
